dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3797 IH: EO 14278 Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14278 (relating to preparing Americans for high-paying skilled trade jobs of the future).

section.text: This Act may be cited as the EO 14278 Act of 2025.
Executive Order 14278 (90 Fed. Reg. 17525); (relating to preparing Americans for high-paying skilled trade jobs of the future) shall have the force and effect of law.
